derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: a specific use of flower in the sense 'the best part', used originally to mean 'the finest quality of ground wheat'. The spelling flower remained in use alongside flour until the early 19th cent

encyclopedia.content: 品牌介绍 Flour是一家专注且多情的甜品店，专注于精致烘培包括蛋糕、小西点、手工饼干等，是一家可提供高端订制服务的精品烘培店。Flour-面粉，稻麦在除毂研磨的过程中去芙存菁，留住的最精华的部分。英文鲜花(Flower)即源自法文的Flour, 连对食物一丝不苟的法国人也尊称其为“fleur de farine”，意为“餐点中最精华的部分”。 业态：餐饮：咖啡茶艺； 主要网点：北京 客单消费：10-300元 目标人群：大众群体经营定位 Flour通过

entry.def: Flour is a white or brown powder that is made by grinding grain. It is used to make bread, cakes, and pastry.

entry.tran: 给…裹上面粉;在…上撒以面粉
entry.def: If you flour cooking equipment or food, you cover it with flour.

example.tran: 在擀面杖上撒上薄薄的一层面粉。

example.ex: Remove the dough from the bowl and put it on a floured surface.
example.tran: 把面团从碗中取出，放在撒有面粉的台面上。

means.word_mean: 1. fine powdery foodstuff obtained by grinding and sifting the meal of a cereal grain

sentences.sentence: "flour fish or meat before frying it"
